.. _community.windows.win_feature_info_module:


**********************************
community.windows.win_feature_info
**********************************

**Gather information about Windows features**


Version added: 1.4.0

.. contents::
   :local:
   :depth: 1


Synopsis
--------
- Gather information about all or a specific installed Windows feature(s).




Parameters
----------

.. raw:: html

    <table  border=0 cellpadding=0 class="documentation-table">
        <tr>
            <th colspan="1">Parameter</th>
            <th>Choices/<font color="blue">Defaults</font></th>
            <th width="100%">Comments</th>
        </tr>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-"></div>
                    <b>name</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td>
                        <b>Default:</b><br/><div style="color: blue">"*"</div>
                </td>
                <td>
                        <div>If specified, this is used to match the <code>name</code> of the Windows feature to get the info for.</div>
                        <div>Can be a wildcard to match multiple features but the wildcard will only be matched on the <code>name</code> of the feature.</div>
                        <div>If omitted then all features will returned.</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
    </table>
    <br/>



See Also
--------

.. seealso::

   :ref:`ansible.windows.win_feature_module`
      The official documentation on the **ansible.windows.win_feature** module.


Examples
--------

.. code-block:: yaml

    - name: Get info for all installed features
      community.windows.win_feature_info:
      register: feature_info
    - name: Get info for a single feature
      community.windows.win_feature_info:
        name: DNS
      register: feature_info
    - name: Find all features that start with 'FS'
      ansible.windows.win_feature_info:
        name: FS*



Return Values
-------------
Common return values are documented `here <https://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/reference_appendices/common_return_values.html#common-return-values>`_, the following are the fields unique to this module:

.. raw:: html

    <table border=0 cellpadding=0 class="documentation-table">
        <tr>
            <th colspan="3">Key</th>
            <th>Returned</th>
            <th width="100%">Description</th>
        </tr>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="3">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>exists</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">boolean</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td>always</td>
                <td>
                            <div>Whether any features were found based on the criteria specified.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">True</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="3">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>features</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">list</span>
                       / <span style="color: purple">elements=dictionary</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td>always</td>
                <td>
                            <div>A list of feature(s) that were found based on the criteria.</div>
                            <div>Will be an empty list if no features were found.</div>
                    <br/>
                </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>additional_info</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">dictionary</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>A list of privileges that the feature requires and will run with</div>
                    <br/>
                </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>install_name</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The action to perform once triggered, can be <code>start_feature</code> or <code>stop_feature</code>.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">ADCertificateServicesRole</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>major_version</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>Major Version of feature <code>name</code>.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">8</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>minor_version</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>Minor Version of feature <code>name</code>.</div>
                    <br/>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>number_id_version</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>Numberic Id of feature <code>name</code>.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">16</div>
                </td>
            </tr>

            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>best_practices_model_id</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>BestPracticesModelId for feature <code>name</code>.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">Microsoft/Windows/UpdateServices</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>depends_on</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">list</span>
                       / <span style="color: purple">elements=string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The command line that will be run when a <code>run_command</code> failure action is fired.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">[&#x27;Web-Static-Content&#x27;, &#x27;Web-Default-Doc&#x27;]</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>

                      <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                    </div>

                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>Depth of <code>name</code> feature.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">1</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>

                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">Example description of the Windows feature.</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>display_name</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The Display name of feature found.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">Active Directory Certificate Services</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>event_query</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The EventQuery for feature <code>name</code>.</div>
                            <div>This will be <code>null</code> if None Present</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">IPAMServer.Events.xml</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>feature_type</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The Feature Type of <code>name</code>.</div>
                            <div>Values will be one of <code>Role</code>, <code>Role Service</code>, <code>Feature</code>.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">Feature</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>install_state</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The Install State of <code>name</code>.</div>
                            <div>Values will be one of <code>Available</code>, <code>Removed</code>, <code>Installed</code>.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">Installed</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>installed</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">boolean</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>Whether the feature by <code>name</code> is installed.</div>
                    <br/>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>

                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>Name of feature found.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">AD-Certificate</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>parent</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The parent of feature <code>name</code> if present.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">PowerShellRoot</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>path</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The Path of <code>name</code> feature.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">WoW64 Support</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>post_configuration_needed</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">boolean</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>Tells if Post Configuration is needed for feature <code>name</code>.</div>
                    <br/>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>server_component_descriptor</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>Descriptor of <code>name</code> feature.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">ServerComponent_AD_Certificate</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>sub_features</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">list</span>
                       / <span style="color: purple">elements=string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>List of sub features names of feature <code>name</code>.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">[&#x27;WAS-Process-Model&#x27;, &#x27;WAS-NET-Environment&#x27;, &#x27;WAS-Config-APIs&#x27;]</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>system_service</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">list</span>
                       / <span style="color: purple">elements=string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The name of the service installed by feature <code>name</code>.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">[&#x27;iisadmin&#x27;, &#x27;w3svc&#x27;]</div>
                </td>
            </tr>

    </table>
    <br/><br/>
